languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс изгибает бровь и бросает на вас взгляд, от которого могло бы свернуться молоко.{/n} "Серьезно, {name}? Ты в самом деле хочешь, чтобы я высказался по поводу этого балагана?" {n}В обычно бесстрастном голосе дознавателя звенят оскорбленные нотки.{/n}

{n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow and gives you a look that could sour milk.{/n} "Are you being serious, {name}? Do you actually want me to give an opinion on this buffoonery?" {n}Instead of his usual impassiveness, he sounds offended.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс изгибает бровь и бросает на вас взгляд, от которого могло бы свернуться молоко.{/n} "Серьезно, {name}? Ты в самом деле хочешь, чтобы я высказался по поводу этого балагана?" {n}В обычно бесстрастном голосе дознавателя звенят оскорбленные нотки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow and gives you a look that could make milk turn.{/n} "Are you being serious, {name}? Do you actually want me to give an opinion on this buffoonery?" {n}Instead of his usual impassiveness, he sounds offended.{/n}

{n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow and gives you a look that could sour milk.{/n} "Are you being serious, {name}? Do you actually want me to give an opinion on this buffoonery?" {n}Instead of his usual impassiveness, he sounds offended.{/n}

{n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow and gives you a look that could sour milk.{/n} "Are you being serious, {name}? Do you actually want me to give an opinion on this buffoonery?" {n}Instead of his usual impassiveness, he sounds offended.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは眉をひそめて渋い表情をした。{/n}「本気ですか、{name}さん？こんな馬鹿げたことに首を突っ込めと？」{n}いつもの無愛想さはなく、彼は怒ったような声を出す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow and gives you a look that could sour milk.{/n} "Are you being serious, {name}? Do you actually want me to give an opinion on this buffoonery?" {n}Instead of his usual impassiveness, he sounds offended.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは眉をひそめて渋い表情をした。{/n}「本気ですか、{name}さん？こんな馬鹿げたことに首を突っ込めと？」{n}いつもの無愛想さはなく、彼は怒ったような声を出す。{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希扬起了眉毛，抛给你的眼神酸得足以让牛奶发馊。{/n}“你是认真的吗，{name}？你真的打算让我对这出闹剧发表看法？”{n}他的声音不同于一贯的无动于衷，听起来像是受到了冒犯。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow and gives you a look that could sour milk.{/n} "Are you being serious, {name}? Do you actually want me to give an opinion on this buffoonery?" {n}Instead of his usual impassiveness, he sounds offended.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希扬起了眉毛，抛给你的眼神酸得足以让牛奶发馊。{/n}“你是认真的吗，{name}？你真的打算让我对这出闹剧发表看法？”{n}他的声音不同于一贯的无动于衷，听起来像是受到了冒犯。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix arquea una ceja y te lanza una mirada que podría agriar la leche.{/n} «¿Lo dice en serio, {name}? ¿De verdad quiere que le dé mi opinión sobre esta burrada?». {n}En lugar de su impasibilidad habitual, su voz revela que está ofendido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow and gives you a look that could sour milk.{/n} "Are you being serious, {name}? Do you actually want me to give an opinion on this buffoonery?" {n}Instead of his usual impassiveness, he sounds offended.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix arquea una ceja y te lanza una mirada que podría agriar la leche.{/n} «¿Lo dice en serio, {name}? ¿De verdad quiere que le dé mi opinión sobre esta burrada?». {n}En lugar de su impasibilidad habitual, su voz revela que está ofendido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hausse un sourcil en vous adressant un regard courroucé.{/n} « Vous vous moquez de moi, {name} ? Vous voulez vraiment entendre mon avis sur cette mascarade ? » {n}La colère est parvenue à éclipser son flegme habituel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow and gives you a look that could sour milk.{/n} "Are you being serious, {name}? Do you actually want me to give an opinion on this buffoonery?" {n}Instead of his usual impassiveness, he sounds offended.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hausse un sourcil en vous adressant un regard courroucé.{/n} « Vous vous moquez de moi, {name} ? Vous voulez vraiment entendre mon avis sur cette mascarade ? » {n}La colère est parvenue à éclipser son flegme habituel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hebt eine Augenbraue und wirft dir einen Blick zu, bei dem Milch sauer würde.{/n} "Im Ernst, {name}? Ich soll wirklich sagen, was ich von diesem Schwindel halte?" {n}Statt seines üblichen Gleichmuts wirkt er tatsächlich beleidigt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow and gives you a look that could sour milk.{/n} "Are you being serious, {name}? Do you actually want me to give an opinion on this buffoonery?" {n}Instead of his usual impassiveness, he sounds offended.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hebt eine Augenbraue und wirft dir einen Blick zu, bei dem Milch sauer würde.{/n} "Im Ernst, {name}? Ich soll wirklich sagen, was ich von diesem Schwindel halte?" {n}Statt seines üblichen Gleichmuts wirkt er tatsächlich beleidigt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix tek kaşını kaldırıyor ve sana sütü dahi ekşitecek denli bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Ciddi misin {name}? Bu şaklabanlığa yorum yapmamı beklemiyorsun herhâlde." {n}Sesinde o alışılageldik ruhsuzluğun yerine bir gücenmişlik var.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix arches an eyebrow and gives you a look that could sour milk.{/n} "Are you being serious, {name}? Do you actually want me to give an opinion on this buffoonery?" {n}Instead of his usual impassiveness, he sounds offended.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix tek kaşını kaldırıyor ve sana bozuk süte bakar gibi bakıyor.{/n} "Ciddi misin {name}? Bu maskaralık hakkında yorum yapmamı mı bekliyorsun gerçekten? {n}Sesi alışılageldik durgunluğunda değil, biraz alınmış gibi çıkıyor.{/n}
